data.text: @NJOmbudsman @ConsumerVoices Legislation is needed for how many are directly assigned on the floor for care.  NOT who is in the building because I promise you no one is coming out of their office to help with a shower, bathroom or meals

@NJOmbudsman @ConsumerVoices It isn't just grandma who needs a little help with care. People of all ages live there often pushed out of a hospital quickly or off the streets with a mix of diagnosis from schizophrenia, pnemonia, post surgery to stoke.

@NJOmbudsman @ConsumerVoices It has been inadequate for years The pandemic brought to fore front what nurses have been saying for years and NO ONE WOULD LISTEN Listing DON and other nurses who never leave their office as staff is the first problem.  1:18 Aide, 1:30 Nurse LTC is like MedSurg Unit 30 yrs ago
